title: Phoenix Open: Scottie Scheffler wins by two shots to return to world number one
description: American Scottie Scheffler regains the world number one ranking by successfully defending his Phoenix Open title with a two-shot win.

title: Mars Wrigley factory fined after two workers fall into chocolate vat
description: Two workers were rescued when a hole was cut in the bottom of a partly-full Mars Wrigley chocolate tank.

description: Washington has been on high alert since its military destroyed a suspected Chinese spy balloon on 4 February.

title: Earthquake tears apart a Turkish-British family

description: Jemimah Rodrigues' unbeaten 53 from 38 balls secures India a seven-wicket win over Pakistan in the Women's T20 World Cup.
